ygData.subject: Re: tradeskills
ygData.msgSnippet: Does Alcohol Tolerance count as a trade skill?    :)    I make a good drunk, high elf cleric.  Probably not, as you don t actually earn anything, oh well.
ygData.messageBody:
Does Alcohol Tolerance count as a trade skill? :) I make a good drunk,
high elf cleric. Probably not, as you don't actually earn anything, oh well.
Tailoring and Jewelcrafting would be my favorite two, followed by baking, then
brewing. Fletching was a pet project of my ranger awhile ago, I'll never go
through that again. The costs of getting a 75 int ranger to skill 200 took
about 1/2 of what it cost to get to 200 in jewel crafting (I don't have any
characters that JC, but a friend and I compared costs involved), which is about
200 times as much as getting to 150 in brewing and baking combined!

Ailamil Faithbringer
Tarew Marr
